mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS registerCount ,area FROM ( SELECT buyers.buyer_no AS buyerNo,buyers.buyer_code AS buyerCode , (case when (buyers.`source` = 1) then '后台' when (buyers.`source` = 2) then '门户' when (buyers.`source` = 3) then '移动端' end) AS `source`, (case when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 52) then '普通会员' when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 53) then '高级会员' end) AS `level`, buyers.created_at AS createdAt , areasBn.country_bn AS country, (CASE WHEN areasBn.country_bn ='China' THEN '中国' ELSE areasZh.name END ) as area FROM erui_buyer.buyer AS buyers LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS areasBn on buyers.country_bn=areasBn.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS areasZh ON areasBn.market_area_bn=areasZh.bn AND areasZh.lang='zh' WHERE buyers.deleted_flag='N' ) as a WHERE source IN ('后台','门户') and createdAt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY area HAVING area IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(1) AS registerCount ,area FROM ( SELECT buyers.buyer_no AS buyerNo,buyers.buyer_code AS buyerCode , (case when (buyers.`source` = 1) then '后台' when (buyers.`source` = 2) then '门户' when (buyers.`source` = 3) then '移动端' end) AS `source`, (case when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 52) then '普通会员' when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 53) then '高级会员' end) AS `level`, buyers.created_at AS createdAt , areasBn.country_bn AS country, (CASE WHEN areasBn.country_bn ='China' THEN '中国' ELSE areasZh.name END ) as area FROM erui_buyer.buyer AS buyers LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS areasBn on buyers.country_bn=areasBn.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS areasZh ON areasBn.market_area_bn=areasZh.bn AND areasZh.lang='zh' WHERE buyers.deleted_flag='N' ) as a WHERE level IN ('普通会员','高级会员') and createdAt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY area HAVING area IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(1) AS total, countryCn as area FROM ( SELECT t1.id, t1.country_bn, ( CASE t1.country_bn WHEN 'China' THEN '中国' ELSE t3. NAME END ) AS countryCn FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1, erui_operation.market_area_country t2, erui_operation.market_area t3 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.country_bn = t2.country_bn AND t2.market_area_bn = t3.bn AND t3.lang = 'zh' AND t1.status != 'DRAFT' AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s" ) AND DATE_FORMAT( #{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s" ) ) AS tb GROUP BY countryCn

SELECT count(id) AS total_num, sum( ifnull(total_quote_price, 0) ) AS total_price, countryCn AS area FROM ( SELECT t1.id, t2.total_quote_price, ( CASE t1.country_bn WHEN 'China' THEN '中国' ELSE t4. NAME END ) AS countryCn FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_rfq.final_quote t2 ON t1.id = t2.inquiry_id, erui_operation.market_area_country t3, erui_operation.market_area t4 WHERE t1.country_bn = t3.country_bn AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t3.market_area_bn = t4.bn AND t4.lang = 'zh' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED', 'COMPLETED') AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( #{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s" ) AND DATE_FORMAT( #{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s" ) ) AS tb GROUP BY countryCn

SELECT countryCn AS area, COUNT(id) AS total_num , SUM(ifnull(total_price_usd, 0)) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT CASE t1.country WHEN 'China' THEN '中国' ELSE t2.name END AS countryCn, t1.id, t1.total_price_usd ,t3.start_date FROM erui_new_order.order t1, erui_operation.market_area t2 , erui_new_order.project t3 WHERE t1.region = t2.bn AND t3.order_id=t1.id AND t2.lang = 'zh' AND t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 AND t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) tb GROUP BY countryCn

SELECT t4.name , COUNT(t4.inqId) AS total FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS inqId,( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.status != 'DRAFT' AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.`name`

SELECT COUNT(t4.inqId) AS total_num, SUM(IFNULL(t4.total_quote_price, 0) ) AS total_price, t4. name FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS inqId, total_quote_price, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.`deleted_flag` = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_rfq.final_quote t3 ON t1.id = t3.inquiry_id AND t3.`deleted_flag` = 'N' WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED', 'COMPLETED') AND t1.updated_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.`name`

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(t4.diff, 0)) AS diff, t4.name FROM ( SELECT t3.diff AS diff, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.`deleted_flag` = 'N', (SELECT inquiry_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, MIN(CASE in_node WHEN 'DRAFT' THEN into_at ELSE NULL END), MAX(CASE out_node WHEN 'MARKET_CONFIRMING' THEN out_at ELSE NULL END)) AS diff FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE in_node = 'DRAFT' OR out_node = 'MARKET_CONFIRMING' GROUP BY inquiry_id) t3 WHERE t1.id = t3.inquiry_id AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED' , 'COMPLETED') AND t1.updated_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name

SELECT t4.name , COUNT(t4.oid) AS total_num ,SUM(IFNULL(t4.total_price, 0)) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name, t1.id AS oid, t1.total_price_usd AS total_price FROM erui_new_order.order t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.business_unit_id = t2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_new_order.project t3 ON t1.id=t3.order_id WHERE t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 and t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name;

SELECT t4.name ,COUNT(1) AS total FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS sid, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name
FROM erui_supplier.supplier t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' WHERE t1.status = 'APPROVED' AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.checked_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name

SELECT t2.name, COUNT(t1.spu) AS total_spu, SUM(t1.sku) AS total_sku FROM (SELECT spu, MAX(bizline_id) AS bizline_id, CONVERT( SUM(sku_count - sku_count_notvalid) / COUNT(id) , SIGNED) AS sku FROM erui_goods.product WHERE deleted_flag = 'N' AND `status` = 'VALID' AND created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY spu) AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t2.id = t1.bizline_id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' GROUP BY t2.name

SELECT count(DISTINCT t4.spu) AS total_spu, t4.name FROM ( SELECT p.spu AS spu, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name from erui_goods.product p LEFT JOIN erui_goods.show_cat_product scp on scp.spu=p.spu and scp.lang=p.lang and scp.onshelf_flag='Y' LEFT JOIN erui_operation.bizline t2 ON p.bizline_id=t2.id where p.deleted_flag='N' and p.lang='en' and scp.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name;

SELECT count(DISTINCT t4.sku) AS total_sku, t4.name FROM ( SELECT g.sku AS sku , ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name from erui_goods.goods g LEFT JOIN erui_goods.product p on p.spu=g.spu and p.lang=g.lang LEFT JOIN erui_goods.show_cat_goods scg on scg.sku=g.sku and scg.lang=g.lang and scg.onshelf_flag='Y' LEFT JOIN erui_operation.bizline t2 ON p.bizline_id=t2.id where g.deleted_flag='N' and p.deleted_flag='N' and g.lang='en' and scg.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT("2018/06/01 00:00:00","%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT("2018/08/10 00:00:00","%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name;

SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_all FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.status != 'DRAFT' AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_all FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED' , 'COMPLETED') AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

select count(1) as total FROM erui_new_order.order t1 , erui_new_order.project t3 where t3.order_id=t1.id AND t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 AND t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
